two variations of the same drug one

cost $1500 amazingly the patients showed
much more improvement to their motor
skills after being given the expensive
drug and the twist in the tale was that
none of them had been given any drug at
all both just saline solution with no
active ingredients such is the power of
the placebo effect the expectation of a
more expensive drug being more effective

when they weren't taking any drugs at
